Smart Microwave Oven: Create a smart microwave oven that can detect the type of food placed inside and automatically adjust cooking time and power level to achieve the desired outcome. This would be achieved through the use of advanced sensors and AI algorithms.

Multi-Functional Microwave Oven: Design a microwave oven that serves as a multi-functional kitchen appliance, with additional features such as a built-in toaster, blender, and slow cooker. This would allow users to prepare a variety of dishes without the need for multiple appliances.

Microwave Oven with Air Frying Technology: Develop a microwave oven that utilizes air frying technology to cook food without added oil. This would allow users to enjoy their favorite fried foods without the added calories and fat content.

Wireless Microwave Oven: Create a microwave oven that can be controlled wirelessly through a smartphone app. This would allow users to start and stop cooking, as well as adjust cooking settings, from anywhere in the house.

Personalized Microwave Oven: Develop a microwave oven that can be customized to meet the specific cooking needs of individual users. This could include adjustable cooking settings, pre-programmed recipes, and personalized cooking preferences.
